title: v5.2.4 upgrade to master with tiupï¼Œtikv report check config fail
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
sh-4.2# ./tikv-server -V
TiKV 
Release Version:   7.4.0-alpha
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   8a44a2c4c11b3da9d776d2877f631922d3833933
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v7.4.0-alpha
UTC Build Time:    2023-08-24 14:36:07
Rust Version:      rustc 1.67.0-nightly (96ddd32c4 2022-11-14)
Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure
Profile:           dist_release
sh-4.2#

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
1. install v5.2.4 cluster with config:
server_configs:
  tidb:
    new_collations_enabled_on_first_bootstrap: false
    performance.gogc: 200
    server-version: 8.0.30
  tikv: {}
  pd: {}
  tidb_dashboard: {}
  tiflash: {}
2. upgrade to master

### What did you expect?
upgrade successfully
### What did happened?
Error: init config failed: cluster-peer:20160: executor.ssh.execute_failed: Failed to execute command over SSH for 'tidb@cluster-peer:22' {ssh_stderr: thread 'main' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', components/raftstore/src/store/[config.rs:777](http://config.rs:777/):13
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace
, ssh_stdout: , ssh_command: export LANG=C; PATH=$PATH:/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin /home/tidb/deploy/tikv-20160/bin/tikv-server --config-check --config=/home/tidb/deploy/tikv-20160/conf/tikv.toml --pd "" --data-dir "/home/tidb/deploy/tikv-20160/data"}, cause: exit status 101: check config failed
